News.headline: Daggers Football Sundays 30th October
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Why not come down to the Daggers Bar on Sunday to enjoy two live games. Watch Everton take on West Ham at Goodison Park from 1:30pm before Southampton take on Chelsea at St Mary's Stadium at 4:00pm.

Take advantage of our Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg, with the offer starting at 12pm and finishing at 7pm.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
